lines: Sɔhwɛ bere mu no, Yesu, srɛ ma me,
Na manyi Wo amma Manfi Wo nɔkyɛn;
Wuhu sɛ mehim a, Fa ɔhwɛ frɛ me;
Ehu anaa 'dom mu, Mma menhwe ase.
Ne 'gyapade bɔne Sɔre tia me a,
Sɛ Wo mmɔborɔhun' De ɔhaw brɛ me;
Anaasɛ yaw to me Wɔ me kwan so a,
Mma me werɛ mmfi da Sɛ mehu Wo nsa;
Ma memfa m'ahiade Nɔto Wo so daa.
